attributes.action: Establish a Maximum Wage as a multiple of the Minimum Wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this would go some way to reduce the inequality gap by ensuring the better-off could only enrich themselves by improving the lot of the poor. 
 enhancements,bonuses,gifts,all payments in kind and any other gains   would be assessed as income to ensure fairness.
